review: I like my Firestick and all the media outlets. Easy to navigate and gives me hours of entertainment. My son hooked it up for me. Seemed fairly easy to do.
author: Sally DiVecchia

review: Are you looking for a simple way to watch Netflix, HBOGo, Amazon Instant Videos, ESPN in your hotel room or any location with a TV and available HDMI port? The Fire TV Stick is for you. The current version of the firmware allows connections to WiFi even if those connections require web authentication.  Perfect solution for on demand portable TV viewing.I haven't tried gaming on the Fire TV Stick, but that should work when you are away from home also.
author: ducatisti.co "gnormal"

review: Very satisfied with this Fire TV Stick.  Got it for my husband to have access to many sports not carried by major networks.  Since we do not have a "Smart TV," this was a perfect alternative!  He was most impressed!
author: J. Mills

review: I really like the Amazon Fire TV Stick. It arrived on time, was simple to set up, and has a great selection of apps. The only thing that I did not like was not being able to active it on the HBO GO app. This because I have Comcast/Xfinity as my cable provider, whom I am extremely disappointed in every month, and the lack of agreement between them and Amazon for activation of the Fire stick for the HBO GO app. I wish that would've know this ahead of time. I didn't see anything about that when researching the Fire stick, and thought it would work, since the app allowed my Kindle Fire HD the be activated for the same app.Still a very good product,  and I would highly recommend it to anyone!
author: Scott K. Halfacre "Scuba Scott"

review: Awesome! Hulu and Netflix apps both skip, though.
author: Tasha

review: I am not very good with audio visual stuff but the Fire Stick was easy to set up.  It connects much faster than my Blu-ray in another room.  It replaced another blu-ray that just wouldn't connect well in my bedroom.  It connects to wi-fi quickly, loads Netflix and Prime quickly which are the two I use, and is a lot less visable than the blu-ray box I had.The remote is easy to use.  It doesn't have a lot of confusing buttons for me.  I have some arthritis in my hands and it is easy to navigate with it.
author: Amazon Customer "Mary"

review: I love it!!! So versatile. If you don't get one your crazy.
